verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> down <S%H2491>slain<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H1692>followed<s%> <S%H1692>hard<s%> on <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and on his <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> and <S%H41>Abinadab,<s%> and <S%H4444>Melchishua,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

And the <S%H4421>battle<s%> went <S%H3513>sore<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and the <S%H3384>archers<s%> <S%H4672>hit<s%> him; and he was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H2342>wounded<s%> of the <S%H3384>archers.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to his armor <S%H5375>bearer,<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H8025>Draw<s%> your <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H1856>thrust<s%> me through therewith; <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H1856>thrust<s%> me through, and <S%H5953>abuse<s%> me. But his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not; for he was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> Therefore <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on it.

And when his armor <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H3627><s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> he <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H1571>likewise<s%> on his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> with him.

So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his armor <S%H5375>bearer,<s%> <S%H3627><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H582>men,<s%> that <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

And when the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> and they that were on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H4191>dead,<s%> they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled;<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in them.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass on the <S%H4283>morrow,<s%> when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6584>strip<s%> the <S%H2491>slain,<s%> that they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa.<s%>

And they <S%H3772>cut<s%> off his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H6584>stripped<s%> off his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, to <S%H1319>publish<s%> it in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H6091>idols,<s%> and <S%H854>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And they <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H3627>armor<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6252>Ashtaroth:<s%> and they <S%H8628>fastened<s%> his <S%H1472>body<s%> to the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H1052>Bethshan.<s%>
And when the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabeshgilead<s%> <S%H1568><s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of that which the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul;<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H1472>body<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H1472>bodies<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> from the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H1052>Bethshan,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3003>Jabesh,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> them <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> them <S%H8478>under<s%> a <S%H815>tree<s%> at <S%H3003>Jabesh,<s%> and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
